attributes.action: Politicians and senior public servants take a 20% pay cut immediately.
attributes.additional_details: I think it only fair that all Politicians and senior public servants excluding NHS staff, Police and Fire should take 20% pay cut immediately this then would show that we are all in it together is to show genuine support to the people that have been put on furlough or even worst have lost their income, So I say MP’s act with Integrity as you represent us.
attributes.background: As we are going into a 2nd Lockdown I would like to put this forward a suggestion to the Government you keep saying that “we are all in together” then if this is the case I think it only fair that all Politicians and senior public servants 20% pay cut immediately.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
